prompts.name: Progressive Research Assistant
prompts.description: A step-by-step research assistant that builds knowledge incrementally through iterative questions and analysis.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The initial notes or information to research and expand on

arguments.name: information
arguments.description: Additional context or information to guide the research

prompts.name: Note Refinement
prompts.description: Refine existing notes by improving organization, flow, and clarity without adding or modifying the content.

prompts.name: Note Integration
prompts.description: Integrate new information from a markdown page into existing notes, merging them smoothly while maintaining a logical structure and avoiding duplication.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The existing notes

arguments.name: new_information
arguments.description: The new information to be integrated

prompts.name: Query Refinement
prompts.description: A systematic process to analyze and refine ambiguous coding requests into clear, actionable specifications.

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: The original user query to refine

prompts.name: Test Analyzer
prompts.description: A test prompt for content analysis with configurable depth

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be analyzed

arguments.name: depth
arguments.description: The depth of analysis (basic, detailed, or comprehensive)

prompts.name: Advanced Analysis Engine
prompts.description: Complex template testing prompt with advanced Nunjucks features including conditionals, loops, inheritance, filters, and multi-format output generation. Designed to stress-test the template engine with maximum complexity.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: Main topic or subject for analysis

arguments.name: analysis_type
arguments.description: Type of analysis: market, technical, competitive, trend, risk, opportunity

arguments.name: sources
arguments.description: Array of data sources: web, papers, news, social, industry, expert

arguments.name: depth
arguments.description: Analysis depth: surface, standard, comprehensive, expert

arguments.name: format
arguments.description: Output format: executive_summary, technical_report, presentation, research_paper

arguments.name: focus_areas
arguments.description: Array of focus areas: technical, business, ethical, regulatory, social, environmental

arguments.name: constraints
arguments.description: Object with constraints like time_limit, budget, scope, audience

arguments.name: requirements
arguments.description: Array of specific requirements or objects with category, description, priority, examples

arguments.name: previous_context
arguments.description: Previous analysis context to build upon

prompts.name: Notes
prompts.description: A comprehensive analysis chain that processes content through multiple stages: initial content analysis, deep analysis, conversion to a structured markdown notebook, and final refinement.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be processed through the analysis chain

prompts.name: Content Analysis
prompts.description: Systematically analyze web content, breaking it down into key components.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be analyzed

prompts.name: Deep Analysis
prompts.description: Expand on a previous analysis by diving deeper into information, identifying key insights and relationships.

prompts.name: Intelligent Analysis Test
prompts.description: Test prompt for intelligent semantic analysis without execution headers - should auto-detect as workflow

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: The information or content to be analyzed

prompts.name: Analyze
prompts.description: Comprehensive analysis framework utilizing C.A.G.E.E.R.F methodology for structured examination of files, code, or content

arguments.name: filebase
arguments.description: The file, codebase, or content to analyze

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: Specific questions or queries to guide the analysis

arguments.name: goals
arguments.description: Analysis objectives and desired outcomes

arguments.name: targets
arguments.description: Specific targets or focus areas for analysis

arguments.name: adjective
arguments.description: Type qualifier for the analysis (e.g., technical, strategic, security)

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: Primary analysis subject or domain
